without their this -> project : 1
their this project -> would : 1
this project would -> not : 1
project would not -> the : 1
would not the -> reynard : 1
not the reynard -> is : 1
the reynard is -> a : 1
reynard is a -> canadian : 1
is a canadian -> writer : 1
a canadian writer -> with : 1
canadian writer with -> an : 1
writer with an -> interest : 1
with an interest -> in : 1
interest in renaissance -> art : 1
in renaissance art -> and : 1
renaissance art and -> culture : 1
art and culture -> and : 1
and culture and -> an : 1
culture and an -> inordinate : 1
and an inordinate -> attachment : 1
an inordinate attachment -> to : 1
inordinate attachment to -> the : 1
attachment to the -> city : 1
to the city -> of : 1
the city of -> it : 1
city of it -> should : 1
of it should -> be : 1
noted that the -> snarky : 1
that the snarky -> narrator : 1
the snarky narrator -> of : 1
snarky narrator of -> was : 1
narrator of was -> contracted : 1
of was contracted -> to : 1
was contracted to -> write : 1
contracted to write -> this : 1
to write this -> biographical : 1
write this biographical -> and : 1
this biographical and -> he : 1
biographical and he -> can : 1
and he can -> attest : 1
he can attest -> that : 1
can attest that -> sr : 1
attest that sr -> in : 1
that sr in -> and : 1
sr in and -> has : 1
in and has -> an : 1
and has an -> enviable : 1
has an enviable -> collection : 1
an enviable collection -> of : 1
enviable collection of -> argyle : 1
collection of argyle -> of : 1
of argyle of -> the : 1
argyle of the -> of : 1
of the of -> the : 1
